about_the_game:
Enter a dark and mysterious forest, where a sinister hostel awaits you, and you'll have to face your worst fears. In this exciting first-person psychological horror FPS game, tension will rise as you explore the hostel and realize that something isn't right. You can feel that something evil is stalking you.

As you delve deeper into the hostel, you'll come across rooms full of blood and strange objects that will put you on guard and make you stay alert. Every time you move through the hostel, you'll have the feeling that someone or something is following you.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a series of mysterious murders that you'll have to investigate to discover who's behind them. But don't be fooled, because the killer is nearby and will do everything possible to avoid being caught.

In addition to investigating the murders, you'll also have to solve a series of challenging puzzles in this psychological horror and puzzle FPS game. To progress in the game, you'll have to use your skills and wit to solve them, but be careful, some of them will be very difficult and will take you time to solve.

In summary, get ready for an exciting and terrifying experience where you'll have to survive in a hostel in the middle of the forest, face terrifying situations, and solve challenging puzzles in a psychological horror and puzzle FPS game. Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy this experience that will keep you glued to the screen!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In this game, you will find yourself in a hostel in the middle of a mysterious forest. You will discover terrifying and mysterious things, from murders to challenging puzzles. Use your skills to uncover the hidden secrets in the hostel. Get ready for an exciting and hair-raising experience!

English*, Spanish - Spain
